# IBoolPropertyItem Interface

## Extends
- *IPropertyItemBase*

A property item which supports boolean properties

## Properties

### **value**
`read-only value: boolean;`

Current value of the property item.

Type: *boolean*

- [setTooltip](#settooltip)
